Overview.title: Overview
Overview.description:
About me
I have 8+ years of experience in modeling and deploying a wide range of scalable web, mobile & desktop applications and robust backend systems.
I am proficient in a variety of programming languages and tools such as C++. JavaScript, Python, PHP, Rust, Node.js, React, AngularJS, ExpressJS, Laravel and Django.
I always pride myself on my ability to translate business requirements into technical solutions, ensuring seamless integration and exceptional user experience.
I adept at leading teams, mentoring junior developers, and collaborating with cross-functional teams to drive project success.
I am eager to contribute technical expertise and innovative problem-solving skills to advance software development initiatives.

Interests.title: Interests
Interests.description:
I'm constantly learning and evolving as a developer - always exploring new technologies, refining my skills, and staying curious.
- AI & Machine Learning:
Passionate about integrating and fine-tuning AI models, especially OpenAI and natural language processing solutions.
- Open Source Contribution:
Enjoy contributing to and exploring open-source projects across multiple languages like Rust, Python, and JavaScript.
- Modern Web Frameworks:
Interested in experimenting with modern frontend ecosystems such as Nuxt, Next.js, Vue, and Tailwind CSS.
- Performance Optimization:
Enthusiastic about improving application performance through smart architectural decisions, microservices, and background processing (e.g., Laravel Queues).
- Automation & Scripting:
Strong interest in automating tasks using Python, browser automation (Selenium, Puppeteer), and building ETL pipelines.
- Cloud Infrastructure & DevOps:
Eager to explore efficient CI/CD, containerization (Docker), and scalable deployment using AWS/Heroku.

Education.title: Education
Education.description:
- Kyiv National University of Technologies and Design

I have earned Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, where I built a solid foundation in software development, algorithms, and system design.
During my studies, I focused on both theoretical principles and practical skills, exploring everything from data structures and databases to web development and AI fundamentals.
This academic experience helped me transition smoothly into real-world software engineering and kickstarted my passion for full-stack development.

Experience.title: Experience
Experience.description:
Over the past 8+ years, I've built a diverse and impactful career as a software engineer, working across startups and established companies in both frontend and backend roles.
- I’ve led engineering teams, architected scalable applications, and delivered high-performance systems used by thousands.
- At KeyUA company, I led the development of scalable web apps, optimized microservices architecture, and contributed to business growth through customized software demos that significantly boosted closing rates.
- During my time at DataScan company, I focused on backend optimization, API design, and Laravel-based performance improvements.
- I reduced server response times and enhanced the user experience with smarter data handling and lazy loading strategies.
- At TechMagic company, I specialized in frontend development using React, Next.js, and Vue.js. I transformed UI designs into fully responsive, accessible, and high-performing applications, while also contributing to reusable component systems.
- Earlier in my career, I built AI-powered applications and backend systems at Nannostomus and Binary Studio, leveraging Python, Rust, Docker, and various ML tools.
- I automated data workflows, integrated third-party APIs, and deployed full-stack solutions to production environments using CI/CD pipelines.
- Each role strengthened my expertise in full-stack development, system design, DevOps, and team collaboration, equipping me with the versatility to contribute across all layers of modern software engineering.

Hard Skills.title: Hard Skills
Hard Skills.description:
These are the technical abilities I've built over years of hands-on experience in full-stack development, system architecture, and AI integration:
- Languages & Frameworks: JavaScript (ES6+), TypeScript, Python, PHP, C#, Rust, HTML5, CSS3, Tailwind CSS, Bootstrap, Sass, jQuery
- Frontend: React, Next.js, Vue.js, Nuxt.js, AngularJS, Svelte, Redux, Pinia
- Backend: Node.js, ExpressJS, Laravel, Django, Flask
- Databases: MySQL, PostgreSQL, MongoDB, MS SQL
- DevOps & Tools: Docker, GitHub Actions, Heroku, AWS, CI/CD pipelines
- APIs & Integrations: RESTful APIs, Stripe, Twilio, Web Scraping (Scrapy, Puppeteer, Selenium)
- AI & Data Processing: Machine Learning basics, OpenAI, Model Integration, Finetunning, Faceswap, Whisper API, Text-to-Speech, ETL pipelines, data visualization, automation scripts
- Application Development: Electron, C#, Rust, Python, React-Native, Flutter

Soft Skills.title: Soft Skills
Soft Skills.description:
I bring the personal and collaborative traits that help me succeed in team environments and deliver value beyond just code:
- Problem-Solving: I take pride in identifying core issues and delivering creative, effective solutions under pressure.
- Team Collaboration: Comfortable working cross-functionally with designers, PMs, and other engineers to align goals and timelines.
- Leadership & Mentoring: Experience leading backend teams and mentoring junior developers to build high-performing teams.
- Communication: Clear communicator with the ability to translate complex technical ideas for non-technical stakeholders.
- Continuous Learning: Always staying up-to-date with new technologies, frameworks, and best practices in software development.
- Attention to Detail: From writing clean, maintainable code to ensuring pixel-perfect UI implementation.

Sports.title: Sports
Sports.description:
Outside of coding, I enjoy staying active and sharpening my focus through sports and gaming. These hobbies not only help me recharge but often inspire my problem-solving mindset as a developer.

I’m passionate about physical health and regularly play football (soccer), go for runs, and hit the gym. Staying active helps me maintain energy, discipline, and a clear mind for complex coding challenges.

Favorite Games.title: Favorite Games
Favorite Games.description: I’m a big fan of strategy and competitive games. Whether it’s classics like Chess, fast-paced rounds of Counter-Strike, or immersive RPGs, I enjoy games that challenge my thinking, reaction, and teamwork - much like software development does.
